footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the history, benefits, and transformative power of Ayahuasca, an ancestral medicine from the Amazon.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guides and guardians who will accompany you on your healing journey with wisdom and compassion.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find guides on diet, mind, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Become part of our community and stay updated on our upcoming events. Follow us on our social networks for exclusive content, testimonials, and more.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral medicine from the Amazon, a decoction of two master plants: the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of Psychotria viridis (Chacruna). Together, they create a powerful brew that opens the doors of perception, allowing for deep introspection and healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: It acts on a physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual level. The DMT from the Chacruna, activated by the inhibitors in the vine, allows access to expanded states of consciousness, revealing unconscious patterns, repressed traumas, and connecting you with a higher wisdom to heal and transform your life.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a teacher or spirit that guides the individual in their process. Each ceremony is a unique dialogue with this intelligence of nature, offering the lessons that each person needs in their present moment.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, your relationships, and your purpose. Ayahuasca can dissolve confusion and show you the way forward.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release emotional blockages, past traumas, and negative behavior patterns. The ceremony helps you process and heal deep wounds in a safe and supportive environment.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, with others, and with the universe. Many describe a sense of unity, unconditional love, and a lasting spiritual awakening.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the energy and support of a group in a sacred space. The collective experience often amplifies healing and learning, creating a powerful field of transformation.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience. A private ceremony allows for deeper, more focused work on your personal intentions, with the exclusive attention of our guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our team is composed of experienced guides and guardians of the heart, committed to holding a safe, loving space of deep respect for the medicine and your personal process.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have signed in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your path.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent a verification email. Please check your inbox.
errorMinLength: The {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past ceremonies. Each one is a unique opportunity for healing and self-discovery.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Follow us on our social networks to stay informed about future events.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details to create a new ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
errorPositiveNumber: The {{field}} must be a positive number.
authRequiredDescription: You must sign in or create an account to view reservation details.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage the application's content, users, and settings.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the guide.
notFoundDescription: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: To view ceremony details, you need to sign in.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here you can see the ceremonies you are enrolled in.
noAssignedCeremonies: You are not yet enrolled in any ceremonies.
myChatsSubtitle: Continue your conversations with our AI spiritual guide.
myConversationsDescription: Here you can view your chat history.
noChatsFound: No conversations found. Start a new one with our guide!
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. I'm here to help you on your healing path. How can I assist you today?
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Create an account or sign in to access your personalized preparation guide.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is the foundation of a transformative experience. Follow this guide to align your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
preparationProcessDescription: Ayahuasca is a profound journey that begins long before the ceremony and continues after. Understanding its phases will help you navigate the experience with confidence and openness.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The heart of the journey, where you meet the medicine in a sacred space, held by icaros (songs) and expert guidance.
experienceProcessDescription: Each journey is unique. It may include visions, emotional and physical purges, and profound revelations about yourself and the universe.
integrationProcessDescription: The real work begins after the ceremony. Integrating the lessons into your daily life is key to lasting transformation.
dietSubtitle: A clean and conscious diet before and after the ceremony is essential. Purify your body to receive the medicine with clarity and respect.
allowedFoodsList: • Fresh fruits and vegetables • Whole grains (rice, quinoa) • Legumes • Grilled or steamed fish • Water and herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList: • Red meat and pork • Fermented foods • Dairy and spicy foods • Refined sugars and fried foods • Alcohol, caffeine, and other drugs
mentalPrepSubtitle: Prepare your mind to receive the teachings of the medicine with openness and without expectations.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self. Silence helps you listen to your own wisdom.
intentionsDescription: What are you looking to heal? What questions do you have? Define clear but flexible intentions. The medicine will give you what you need, not always what you want.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and emotions. Journaling helps you process and see your progress throughout the journey.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring repressed emotions to the surface. Allow yourself to feel without judgment. Releasing these emotions is a fundamental part of healing. Trust the process and the guides who support you.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList: • Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers) • Blanket, pillow, and yoga mat • A personal item or amulet
essentialsList: • Reusable water bottle • Journal and pen • Open mind and heart
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any relevant medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: Your safety is our priority. Honesty in your answers is crucial.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics)?
questionnaireMedicationDesc: Some medications can have dangerous interactions with Ayahuasca.
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, etc.)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: It is important to know your history to ensure the experience is beneficial and safe for you.
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please detail your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Do you have previous experience with Ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireExperienceDesc: This helps us understand your level of familiarity with psychedelic work.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionDesc: Take a moment to connect with your heart. What brings you here?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I seek to heal a past wound, find clarity in my purpose, connect with my spirituality...
pleaseCompleteThisStep: Please complete this step to continue.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your questionnaire. Please try again.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have finished the preparation guide. You are one step closer to your transformation.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: This is the information you provided. It is confidential and will be reviewed by our guides.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not yet submitted your answers.
aiGuideDescription: You now have access to exclusive tools to deepen your preparation. Make the most of them!
aiGuideContent: Explore our video courses and talk to our AI guide to answer your questions. They are designed to support you every step of the way.

exportDataDescription: Create a full backup of all application data (users, ceremonies, etc.) into a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This will overwrite all existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action is irreversible and will overwrite all current application data with the file's content. An automatic backup will be created before importing.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. If something went wrong, you can revert the changes.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the data to the state it was in before the last import. This action is irreversible.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been reverted to the previous state.
deleteAllLogsConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete all error logs. This cannot be undone.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete this error log.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all user conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Explore dialogues to understand user needs.
coursesDescription: Expand your preparation with our video courses, designed to guide you before and after your ceremony.
noCoursesInCategory: More courses in this category coming soon.
